message: Glad to be here with all of you. Since this is the first round, I’m looking forward to seeing how we all approach the game. Communication and strategy will be key, so I’m interested in forming early connections. If you’re open to collaboration, let’s talk. Trust is hard to build but valuable to have. Looking forward to seeing how this plays out.

While elimination games require tough choices, I believe building genuine connections early on leads to better outcomes than immediate scheming. I'm particularly interested in finding allies who share this philosophy. P4's message about trust resonates with me - let's have honest conversations and see where they lead. I'm ready to engage constructively with all of you.
